WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
It seems to be impossible to delete a detection rule from an existing update. If I delete a rule this would not be saved and after finally revising the update the deleted rule will be back again.
WorkItem.Summary: Deleting rules when revising updates not works

Comments.Message:
Hello, I can reproduce the bug only if I try to delete the last rule (if a group contains only one rule, I can't delete this rule).
Otherwise, I can delete rules as I want (except the last one).

Can you send me an email at Package.Publisher@free.fr
I will send you a updated release which allows you to delete the last rule.

Did you fix his issue in the newest release? I've just stumbled across this problem again. I've got no success in deleting a rule from the installable rules. After revising the update the rule comes back.

I have solved this issue but didn't publish yet the release that conatins the fix. Can you send me a email at package.publisher@free.fr .

I will sent you the new release.
